/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with trees and lampposts, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The perspective of the image is from the left side of the street, looking towards the right, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky and the gray of the buildings.
